channel.title: Check if player is online

item.title: Check if player is online
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:6, topic:522156”][quote author=NieX link=topic=640662.msg4316932#msg4316932 date=1371658674]
if you’re wanting to use your boolean for it (idk why you would) :

boolean connected = false; if(c.playerName().equalsOnline){ connected = true; c.sendMessage(c.playerName+" has logged in!"); }else{ connected = false; }

Idk if i’ve declared it correctly as im not sure of your revision but that’s how you could use a boolean in such an instance i suppose :S
[/quote]

Idiocy has risen to a while new level… :|[/quote]I’d tap the mother

Read full topic

item.title: Check if player is online
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

you serious? booleans return true or false something like

public boolean isPlayerOnline(String playerName) { if (playerOnline(playerName)) { return true; } return false; }

Read full topic

item.title: Check if player is online
item.dc:creator: @ReaperXScape ReaperXScape
item.description:
@ReaperXScape wrote:

hey, i need to make like a boolean on my allstar to check if a player is online or not, i will post an example of what i want it to look like, but i dont wanna be spoonfed, i just need help figuring out how i would make this.
i would want it to be called like this :

if (isPlayerOnline(playerName)) {
code here
}

thats how i would call it, and the boolean would be like

public boolean isPlayerOnline(String playerName) {
}

anybody know how i would build this code?

Read full topic
